import { IonContent, IonHeader, IonPage, IonTitle, IonToolbar, IonButton, IonRow,IonGrid, IonCol, IonImg, IonButtons} from '@ionic/react'; import React from 'react'; import "./WebInfoPage.css"; import { RouteComponentProps } from 'react-router'; const WebInfo: React.FC = ({history}) => { return ( Cal Poly Thermal Comfort history.push("/")}> Sign In

Are you tired of dripping flushed face Wednesday afternoons?

Help us discover a Cal Poly campus where back sweat and goosebumps are a thing of the past!

Click below to download our cool app.

See Terms & Conditions ); }; export default WebInfo;
